wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Edwards (1882–1944) was an English footballer who played for Barnsley, Crystal Palace and Doncaster Rovers. Edwards played for Palace during their shock FA Cup win over Newcastle United in 1907.

link_mentions.page: List of people with given name Matthew

response: * Matthew Edwards (footballer) (1882–1944), English football player (Barnsley, Crystal Palace and Doncaster Rovers)
* Matthew Edwards, musician with The Music Lovers
* Matthew Edwards (soccer) (born 2003), American soccer player for Atlanta United 2
